title: Riot, Please i need a little RP!!
body:
Hey guys i recently bought Yasuo and want his skin but i need 65 RP more! if anyone is kind enough to give a $5 gift you're the best!! Riot also if you're reading this please it would be super nice of you !! thank you y'all!

User: JulzFTW

replies.body:
Looks like it's your lucky day ^_^! 

Shoot me a quick drawing of your best Yasuo inspired poro, and then dis poro can work his magic!



PS My reply *could* take a bit since I'll be going on a longish weekend after today! I'll be sure to check back as often as I can until then though
https://ibb.co/k8KtHG Here is my account and RP!

https://ibb.co/now5CG Hope this is able to be viewed and meets your expectations! Thank you so much, you're the best!! The skin that i want is the Nightbringer Yasuo which is 1820 rp and i have 1655 rp. Thanks again!
Unfortunately, Riot doesn't gift out 3 digits of RP. If you needed a smaller amount, such as within 2 digits, they might be more inclined to help you out.
